author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Gateway Lifestyle Group Says ‍HY Net Profit Attributable Up 2.8% To $20.6 Mln
text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - Gateway Lifestyle Group:
* ‍HY NET PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE UP 2.8% TO $20.6 MILLION * ‍HY REVENUES FROM ORDINARY OPERATIONS UP 22.3% TO $64.1 MILLION
* ‍INTERIM DISTRIBUTION 3.75 CENTS PER SECURITY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
